message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you first. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking $150 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 is my initial asking price, I could come down to $130.  I believe this product is worth the value and would be a great investment for you.
I appreciate you coming down to $130, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
